pageContext.claim: “Joe Biden just said, 'We believe in facts, not truth.' Does anybody really believe he is mentally fit to be president? We are 'playing' in a very big and complicated world. Joe doesn't have a clue!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump without evidence says one of his main rivals is not "mentally fit," after choosing to misquote a minor gaffe made by the former vice president. Biden had said: "We choose about truth, not facts." (Comedian Stephen Colbert joked that Biden went on to say things we choose like "hope over optimism, faith over belief and synonyms over words that mean the same things.")
